name: 1st Annual Fish Golf Charity Tournament Deluxe 10th Anniversary Edition
name_original: 1st Annual Fish Golf Charity Tournament Deluxe 10th Anniversary Edition
description:
FISH GOLF! Fish golf is the next step in human existence. Are you the ultimate gamer? Prove it by beating your friends or working together in our new Multiplayer experience. The first player to put the fish into the sink wins! Sounds simple, right? Actually, this is the hardest game in the golf genre. Press left click to fill your hit gauges. Then press left click again to launch your fish. While watching your fleshy fish fly, press SPACE to floppily flip your thrusting fish forward. Don't forget to finish your turn in a puddle, or you will find yourself at the start! Repair each sink on the Moon, Medieval Europe, Coral Reef, Ice Mountain, and Golf Course. Remember, if the Fish is in the Sink, take it out! Cause it's going to smell

Programmers: Adam Weber, Lance Pearson

Artists: Nathan Karrels, Nikkos Horaitis, Ethan Pawinski, Dan Carmichael

Music used by https://www.bensound.com/ .
